title: 2nd time this has happened....
body:
https://gyazo.com/9ad387fdb36958d372af6d02ae4a7828.png
Can't see 
Bans
Picks
And cant even pick my own champion.

replies.body:
It sucks to hear this is starting to be a recurring issue, and I don't recommend hopping back into queue until it gets resolved.  Assets not loading during champions select can be caused by either pc stress or even an unstable connection causing you to lose sync.  To start, I suggest using [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode to reduce that stress during champ select.

Test it out in a custom game!  Should the issue persist, then run through each steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out possibilities with your network.  That should do the trick!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=nInybsxh,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-24T20:47:33.049+0000)
>
> It sucks to hear this is starting to be a recurring issue, and I don't recommend hopping back into queue until it gets resolved.  Assets not loading during champions select can be caused by either pc stress or even an unstable connection causing you to lose sync.  To start, I suggest using [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode to reduce that stress during champ select.
> 
> Test it out in a custom game!  Should the issue persist, then run through each steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out possibilities with your network.  That should do the trick!

Its starting to happen to alot of people... pls look at the boards.

While I do see this issue come up every now and then, it's usually caused and resolved by the reasons above.  I'm not seeing any posts emerging, right now though.  Do you have any links I can take a look at?  In the meantime, it's really important to go through  those steps as basic troubleshooting is important before anything else.  Thanks!

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/LP0TKmZr-champion-list-not-appearing-in-select 
Here is a more recent one ^_^

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/eWZAwlsf-dont-show-champions - Here is the most recent one
And yes... ive gone through the steps :P
